channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: THIRD report!!!!! Illuminated sign OUT, 18th December
item.description:
This is now the third report for this sign light not working!!!! One way sign, on left hand side on the lamp post! Each time reported it’s been marked as fixed but yet never been lit!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Ringers Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chestnut Road SE27 outside house number 2 green, 18th December
item.description:
Chestnut Road SE27 outside house number 2 green painted metal footpath box graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin & picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Chestnut Road, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chestnut Road SE27 re the side of 539 – 541 Norwood, 18th December
item.description:
Chestnut Road SE27 re the side of 539 – 541 Norwood Road (Co-op shop) – towards the rear of the side of this shop (next to the loading bay) grey door graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin, picture and Google Streetview: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4343009,-0.1031302,3a,75y,337.63h,81.94t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s-UzOoOwehKuSxs4IrKpC7w!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D8.058122919692636%26panoid%3D-UzOoOwehKuSxs4IrKpC7w%26yaw%3D337.62978882270517!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwOS4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 539-541, Norwood Road, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight CW104 is not working, 18th December
item.description:
CW104 is on the narrow path with a deep slope into a dell on one side. It is completely dark and unsafe, especially as the sides of the footpath have deep ruts of mud caused by Peabody vehicles driving through the area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Ridgeway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights out along Crossway, 18th December
item.description:
At least 6 street lights are out from Poplar Place to Glendale Road. Both sides of the road resulting in total darkness for pedestrians and vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged brick paving a severe trip hazard, 18th December
item.description:
The brick paved sidewalk running alongside the bridge over the A2 has two bricks misplaced with one set very proud right in the middle of the walkway, creating a dangerous trip hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Well Hall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Bus Station - Damage to road or pavement within the Bus Station

item.title: Deep pot holes collecting water on pavement, 18th December
item.description:
Deep pot holes and sunken pavement, the public path along the rail track. Water collects making it impossible to pass for the disabled and pushchair users as the only option to avoid it is by climbing the slippery sloped verge full of mud. Been like this for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Longfield Crescent, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
